text:
Hi Guys,
Need help how to add the existing blogs to the new listing page.
if anyone have the HubSpot blog tutorial
I have created a new module and added it to a template page. How can I get the module to show on the published pages using that template? Thank you
This issue is getting worse, it's not consistent from day to day with what the settings in the editor are, I'm submitting a support ticket

If you’re adding the module to the fixed markup of the page, that module should appear on those pages immediately upon publishing.

However, if you’re placing the module within a `{% dnd_area %}`, you’ll have to place it on each of those existing pages manually.
Yeah, I am adding it within {% dnd_area %} and it doesn't show unless I rebuild the page.  I hoped there is a way to update upon upload. Thank you

I’ve used another solution not necessarily better or worse, but basically I create one big form, and use the richtext to add a break where ever I want a new step, I then use JS to split those fields into sections.

There’s quite a lot of extra customisation in there too complicating the JS though, and basically at several steps we qualify people out and just redirect to other pages <https://www.pure-ip.com/build-your-own>
